full_text: Case 1:20-cv-00233-PAE Document 1207-10 Filed 10/22/01 Page 7 of 8 Page 173 G Maxwell - Confidential convicted. I know he spent time in jail. Q. Do you know that he spent time in jail related to an issue with a minor child? MR. PAGLIUCA: Objection to the form and foundation. A. I did not know that. Q. What did you think he was spending time in jail for? A. I only know he went to jail for -- it was alleged that he hired -- had an underage prostitute. Q. So knowing that, do you believe that Jeffrey Epstein sexually abused minors? MR. PAGLIUCA: Objection to the form and foundation. A. I can only tell you what he went to jail for. Q. I'm asking what you believe. I'm not asking what he went to jail for. I'm asking for your belief. A. I cannot testify to what I believe. I can only say what I have seen in the reports and I know he went to jail. Q. You can testify to what you
